snippet.title: Cat Detective Albert Wilde - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Cat Detective Albert Wilde - Release Date Trailer
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1810670/
Launch on Steam on 24th of January, 2025

Cat Detective Albert Wilde is a comedy noir, sci - fi mystery game that blends elements of a walking simulator and interactive novel, with a strong focus on humor. 

A freakish corpse, a pissed-off bookie, a wormhole to another reality.  It's just another day in the office for Albert Wilde, feline private eye. Cat Detective set in New York in the 1930’s, featuring atmospheric visuals, anthropomorphic characters and at least one joke about cat nipples (they have six!). 

Play as the Cat Detective Albert Wilde. Walk, talk, interrogate, joke, solve a mystery, and experience an old film noir setting with humanoid animal characters. A story of quantum theory and parallel universes served with a lot of humour in 6 -7 hours of gameplay. 

It’s less of a typical "whodunnit" and more of an origin story—showing how Albert Wilde evolves from a Private Investigator (P.I.) to a Quantum Private Investigator.

Developed by beyondthosehills
https://beyondthosehills.com/

Join us on Discord:
https://beyondthosehills.com/discord

The trailer was made by Extra Nice team
